title: Practice Exercise
description:
Build your own **Enhanced Calculator** with these improvements: - **Add a title banner** using multiple print statements to make it look professional - **Display all 7 operations** in the menu (we've given you the structure) - **Get the user's choice and two numbers** - **Perform the calculation** using if-elif-else for each operation - **Format the output nicely** using f-strings **Bonus Challenge:** Add a farewell message that includes the user's name! Ask for their name at the beginning and use it in the goodbye message. **Example output:** 
===================================
   SUPER CALCULATOR PRO 3000
===================================

What's your name? Alice

Hi Alice! Let's do some math!

Choose an operation:
1. Addition (+)
2. Subtraction (-)
... etc ...

Enter your choice (1-7): 4
Enter first number: 20
Enter second number: 4

Result: 20.0 / 4.0 = 5.0

Thanks for calculating, Alice! See you next time!

hints.text: Remember to convert input to the right type: int() for the menu choice, float() for numbers that might have decimals. Use the operators you learned: +, -, *, /, //, %, **. Copy the pattern from the code example for the if-elif-else chain.
